name: phpmyadmin
description: phpMyAdmin is a self-hosted web-based interface for managing MySQL and MariaDB. It provides access to database structure, queries, and exports through an easy-to-use administrative UI.

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Create, modify, drop, and manage MySQL and MariaDB databases through a web interface

features.title: Rich Text Editor
features.description: Design tables with visual editors for columns, indexes, and foreign key relationships

features.title: Sql Query Execution
features.description: Run SQL queries with syntax highlighting, history, and bookmarking for frequent operations

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Transfer data using SQL, CSV, XML, and other formats with compression support

features.title: Access Control
features.description: Manage database users, privileges, and access controls with granular permissions

features.title: High Performance
features.description: View server status, variables, processes, and performance metrics in real-time

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Search across databases, tables, and data with advanced query builders
